aboutMe.name: Ben Langenberg
aboutMe.about: I'm a front-end developer specialized in designing and building accessible web applications. Currently I'm focused on my studies at the Hogeschool van Amsterdam majoring in Communication & Multimediadesign with a specialization in front-end development.

projects.description: Small Spotify playlist clone made using the Spotify API
Pocket Tour Guide, a travel and planning app for sightseeing
